title: The Valley is where L.A.'s mayoral race could be won or lost
dc:creator: Benjamin Oreskes
description: The vote-rich San Fernando Valley is essential to the mayoral hopes of both Karen Bass and Rick Caruso. Recent polling shows the two essentially tied among likely voters.
content:encoded: The vote-rich San Fernando Valley is essential to the mayoral hopes of both Karen Bass and Rick Caruso. Recent polling shows the two essentially tied among likely voters.

media:content.media:description: Los Angeles, CA - October 08: Volunteer Trisha Dexter, right, talks to a resident Amira Saunders while campaigning door to door for Karen Bass in Van Nuys on Saturday, Oct. 8, 2022 in Los Angeles, CA. (Irfan Khan / Los Angeles Times)
